about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in this tower defense type game, it has 20 levels and each level must be completed perfectly to get the 3 stars. giving a total of 60 stars.

Defend your neighborhood from zombies, build archer, sniper, bomber or electric towers, as the case may be. Strategically place your units, enemies have different abilities, such as agility, shield and amount of life. Each enemy eliminated will give you resources to improve your towers.

Bomb tower for crowds of enemies.

Fast action archers.

Snipers for fast enemies.

Electric shocks for enemies with metal shields.

Do not allow the zombies to reach their destination or they will subtract hearts that will prevent you from reaching the 3 stars.

Flying zombies, zombies with shields, zombies with helmets and giant zombies, is what you will find in this game.

Many hours of play, different strategies to complete the levels.

Very high moments of tension.
